channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- containernetworking/plugins
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- containernetworking/plugins

item.title: CVE-2020-10749|2024-08-04T11:14:15.590Z -- red%20hat -- containernetworking%2Fplugins
item.description: A vulnerability was found in all versions of containernetworking/plugins before version 0.8.6, that allows malicious containers in Kubernetes clusters to perform man-in-the-middle (MitM) attacks. A malicious container can exploit this flaw by sending rogue IPv6 router advertisements to the host or other containers, to redirect traffic to the malicious container.
